title: Gilles Brisson
text:
Gilles Brisson (born 9 April 1958) is a French former professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player and manager. As a player, he was a <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>. He notably played for <a href="Paris%20Saint-Germain%20F.C.">Paris Saint-Germain</a>, <a href="Toulouse%20FC">Toulouse</a>, and <a href="FC%20Sochaux-Montb%C3%A9liard">Sochaux</a>.
Personal life.
Gilles is the twin brother of <a href="Fran%C3%A7ois%20Brisson">François</a>, who is also a former footballer. They played together at Paris Saint-Germain.
Honours.
Player.
Sochaux
Manager.
Rochefort
